item.title: Upper Deck Door Battery OK Lights

remarks.para: One press-to-test system may be inoperative provided associated system is verified to be adequately charged once each flight day.

placard.para: Install Placard below Captain's PFD on P-1-1 on affected door: "____ BATTERY OK LIGHT INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

note.para: The repetitive inspection required when this item is inoperative must be documented in the Aircraft Log at the prescribed intervals. (Refer to GMM, Chapter 3, Section 6.)

numlitem.para: Depress and hold operational BATTERY OK lighted switch on DOOR ANNUNCIATOR module above door. Check that light illuminates after a delay of approximately 2 seconds and extinguishes when switch is released.
Open hinged access panels in overhead between doors.
Remove batteries from M7037 and M7038 receptacles (AMM 52-23-14).
Install M7037 battery in M7038 receptacle and M7038 battery in M7037 receptacle.

Depress and hold operational BATTERY OK lighted switch on DOOR ANNUNCIATOR module above door. Check that light illuminates after a delay of approximately 2 seconds and extinguishes when switch is released. If light illuminates both systems are adequately charged.
